get.description: List the operations for the provider

Gets a list of Azure Large Instances in the specified subscription. The
operations returns various properties of each Azure Large Instance.

Gets a list of AzureLargeStorageInstances in the specified subscription. The
operations returns various properties of each Azure LargeStorage instance.

Gets a list of Azure Large Instances in the specified subscription and resource
group. The operations returns various properties of each Azure Large Instance.

Gets an Azure Large Instance for the specified subscription, resource group,
and instance name.

patch.description:
Patches the Tags field of an Azure Large Instance for the specified
subscription, resource group, and instance name.

parameters.name: tagsParameter
parameters.description: The resource properties to be updated.

post.description: The operation to restart an Azure Large Instance (only for compute instances)

parameters.name: forceParameter
parameters.description: When set to 'active', this parameter empowers the server with the ability to forcefully terminate and halt any existing processes that may be running on the server

Location.description: The Location header contains the URL where the status of the long running operation can be checked.

Retry-After.description: The Retry-After header can indicate how long the client should wait before polling the operation status.

post.description: The operation to shutdown an Azure Large Instance (only for compute instances)

Location.description: The Location header contains the URL where the status of the long running operation can be checked.

Retry-After.description: The Retry-After header can indicate how long the client should wait before polling the operation status.

post.description: The operation to start an Azure Large Instance (only for compute instances)

Location.description: The Location header contains the URL where the status of the long running operation can be checked.

Retry-After.description: The Retry-After header can indicate how long the client should wait before polling the operation status.

get.description:
Gets a list of AzureLargeStorageInstances in the specified subscription and
resource group. The operations returns various properties of each Azure
LargeStorage instance.

Gets an Azure Large Storage instance for the specified subscription, resource
group, and instance name.

patch.description:
Patches the Tags field of a Azure Large Storage Instance for the specified
subscription, resource group, and instance name.

parameters.name: tagsParameter
parameters.description: The resource properties to be updated.

ApiVersionParameter.name: api-version
ApiVersionParameter.description: The API version to use for this operation.

If-Match.name: ifMatch
If-Match.description: The If-Match header that makes a request conditional.

If-None-Match.name: ifNoneMatch
If-None-Match.description: The If-None-Match header that makes a request conditional.

LocationParameter.name: location
LocationParameter.description: The name of the Azure region.

ManagementGroupNameParameter.name: managementGroupName
ManagementGroupNameParameter.description: The name of the management group. The name is case insensitive.

OperationIdParameter.name: operationId
OperationIdParameter.description: The ID of an ongoing async operation.

ResourceGroupNameParameter.name: resourceGroupName
ResourceGroupNameParameter.description: The name of the resource group. The name is case insensitive.

ScopeParameter.name: scope
ScopeParameter.description: The scope at which the operation is performed.

SubscriptionIdParameter.name: subscriptionId
SubscriptionIdParameter.description: The ID of the target subscription. The value must be an UUID.

TenantIdParameter.name: tenantId
TenantIdParameter.description: The Azure tenant ID. This is a GUID-formatted string (e.g. 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000)

AzureLargeInstance.description:
Azure Large Instance info on Azure (ARM properties and AzureLargeInstance
properties)

properties.description: The resource-specific properties for this resource.

AzureLargeInstanceForcePowerState.description: Enum of two possible values to determine if the ALI instance restart operation should forcefully terminate and halt any existing processes that may be running on the server or not.

values.name: active
values.description: Active means that the restart operation will terminate and halt existing processes that may be running on the server

values.name: inactive
values.description: Inactive means that the restart operation will not terminate and halt existing processes that may be running on the server

AzureLargeInstanceHardwareTypeNamesEnum.description: Enum of the hardware options (vendor and/or their product name) for an Azure Large Instance

values.name: Cisco_UCS
values.description: Hardware type of UCS from vendor Cisco

values.name: HPE
values.description: Hardware type of HPE from vendor Hewlett Packard Enterprise

values.name: SDFLEX
values.description: Hardware type of SDFLEX

AzureLargeInstanceListResult.description: The response of a AzureLargeInstance list operation.

value.description: The AzureLargeInstance items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

AzureLargeInstancePowerStateEnum.description: Power states that an Azure Large Instance can be in

values.name: starting
values.description: Starting means that the Azure Large Instance resource is turning on.

values.name: started
values.description: Started means that the Azure Large Instance resource has been powered on.

values.name: stopping
values.description: Stopping means that the Azure Large Instance resource is shutting down.

values.name: stopped
values.description: Stopped means that the Azure Large Instance resource has shut down.

values.name: restarting
values.description: Restarting means that the Azure Large Instance resource is restarting.

values.name: unknown
values.description: Unknown means that the state of the Azure Large Instance is unknown.

AzureLargeInstanceProperties.description: Describes the properties of an Azure Large Instance.

hardwareProfile.description: Specifies the hardware settings for the Azure Large Instance.

storageProfile.description: Specifies the storage settings for the Azure Large Instance disks.

osProfile.description: Specifies the operating system settings for the Azure Large Instance.

networkProfile.description: Specifies the network settings for the Azure Large Instance.

azureLargeInstanceId.description: Specifies the Azure Large Instance unique ID.

hwRevision.description: Hardware revision of an Azure Large Instance

provisioningState.description: State of provisioning of the AzureLargeInstance

AzureLargeInstanceProvisioningStatesEnum.description: Provisioning states that an Azure Large Instance can be in

values.name: Accepted
values.description: Accepted means Azure Large Instance resource provisioning has been accepted.

values.name: Creating
values.description: Creating means Azure Large Instance resource is being created.

values.name: Updating
values.description: Updating means an existing Azure Large Instance resource is being updated

values.name: Failed
values.description: Failed means Azure Large Instance resource is in failed state

values.name: Succeeded
values.description: Succeeded means Azure Large Instance resource creation succeeded during last create/update

values.name: Deleting
values.description: Deleting means Azure Large Instance resource is in the process of being deleted

values.name: Migrating
values.description: Migrating means Azure Large Instance resource is being migrated from one subscription or resource group to another

values.name: Canceled
values.description: Cancelled Azure Large Instance resource operation has been cancelled

AzureLargeInstanceTagsUpdate.description: The type used for updating tags in AzureLargeInstance resources.

AzureLargeStorageInstance.description:
AzureLargeStorageInstance info on Azure (ARM properties and
AzureLargeStorageInstance properties)

properties.description: The resource-specific properties for this resource.

AzureLargeStorageInstanceListResult.description: The response of a AzureLargeStorageInstance list operation.

value.description: The AzureLargeStorageInstance items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

AzureLargeStorageInstanceProperties.description: Describes the properties of an AzureLargeStorageInstance.

storageProperties.description: Specifies the storage properties for the AzureLargeStorage instance.

AzureLargeStorageInstanceTagsUpdate.description: The type used for updating tags in AzureLargeStorageInstance resources.

CreatedByType.description: The type of identity that created the resource: User, Application, ManagedIdentity

values.name: User
values.description: An AAD user. The createdByType/lastModifiedBy property will be a user principal name (email address).

values.name: Application
values.description: An AAD application. The createdByType/lastModifiedBy property will be the Application Id.

values.name: ManagedIdentity
values.description: A Managed Identity. The createdByType/lastModifiedBy property will be the ManagedIdentity resource Id

values.name: Key
values.description: A key

Disk.description: Specifies the disk information fo the Azure Large Instance

diskSizeGB.description: Specifies the size of an empty data disk in gigabytes.

lun.description:
Specifies the logical unit number of the data disk. This value is used to
identify data disks within the VM and therefore must be unique for each data
disk attached to a VM.

ForceState.description:
The active state empowers the server with the ability to forcefully terminate
and halt any existing processes that may be running on the server

forceState.description: Whether to force restart by shutting all processes.

HardwareProfile.description: Specifies the hardware settings for the Azure Large Instance.

hardwareType.description: Name of the hardware type (vendor and/or their product name)

azureLargeInstanceSize.description: Specifies the Azure Large Instance SKU.

IpAddress.description: Specifies the IP address of the network interface.

ipAddress.description: Specifies the IP address of the network interface.

NetworkProfile.description: Specifies the network settings for the Azure Large Instance disks.

networkInterfaces.description: Specifies the network interfaces for the Azure Large Instance.

circuitId.description: Specifies the circuit id for connecting to express route.

OsProfile.description: Specifies the operating system settings for the Azure Large Instance.

computerName.description: Specifies the host OS name of the Azure Large Instance.

osType.description: This property allows you to specify the type of the OS.

sshPublicKey.description: Specifies the SSH public key used to access the operating system.

ProvisioningState.description: An enum of possible operation states for an AzureLargeStorageInstances

values.name: Accepted
values.description: Accepted means ARM resource has been accepted.

values.name: Creating
values.description: Creating means ARM resource is being created.

values.name: Updating
values.description: Updating means an existing ARM resource is being updated

values.name: Failed
values.description: Failed means resource is in failed state

values.name: Succeeded
values.description: Succeeded means resource creation succeeded during last create/update

values.name: Deleting
values.description: Deleting means resource is in the process of being deleted

values.name: Canceled
values.description: Cancelled means resource operation has been cancelled

values.name: Migrating
values.description: Migrating means resource is being migrated from one subscription or resource group to another

StorageBillingProperties.description: Describes the billing related details of the AzureLargeStorageInstance.

billingMode.description: the billing mode for the storage instance

sku.description: the SKU type that is provisioned

StorageProfile.description: Specifies the storage settings for the Azure Large Instance disks.

nfsIpAddress.description: IP Address to connect to storage.

osDisks.description:
Specifies information about the operating system disk used by Azure Large
Instance.

StorageProperties.description: described the storage properties of the azure large storage instance

provisioningState.description: State of provisioning of the AzureLargeStorageInstance

offeringType.description: the offering type for which the resource is getting provisioned

storageType.description: the storage protocol for which the resource is getting provisioned

hardwareType.description: the hardware type of the storage instance

workloadType.description: the workload for which the resource is getting provisioned

storageBillingProperties.description: the billing related information for the resource

Tags.description: Tags field of the AzureLargeInstance instance.

tags.description: Tags field of the AzureLargeInstance instance.

AzureEntityResource.title: Entity Resource
AzureEntityResource.description: The resource model definition for an Azure Resource Manager resource with an etag.

name.description: The name of the resource for which availability needs to be checked.

nameAvailable.description: Indicates if the resource name is available.

reason.description: The reason why the given name is not available.

message.description: Detailed reason why the given name is available.

ErrorAdditionalInfo.description: The resource management error additional info.

ErrorResponse.title: Error response
ErrorResponse.description: Common error response for all Azure Resource Manager APIs to return error details for failed operations. (This also follows the OData error response format.).

principalId.description: The principal ID of resource identity. The value must be an UUID.

tenantId.description: The tenant ID of resource. The value must be an UUID.

keyIdentifier.description: Key vault uri to access the encryption key.

identity.description: The client ID of the identity which will be used to access key vault.

Operation.title: REST API Operation
Operation.description: Details of a REST API operation, returned from the Resource Provider Operations API

name.description: The name of the operation, as per Resource-Based Access Control (RBAC). Examples: "Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines/write", "Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines/capture/action"

isDataAction.description: Whether the operation applies to data-plane. This is "true" for data-plane operations and "false" for ARM/control-plane operations.

display.description: Localized display information for this particular operation.

provider.description: The localized friendly form of the resource provider name, e.g. "Microsoft Monitoring Insights" or "Microsoft Compute".

resource.description: The localized friendly name of the resource type related to this operation. E.g. "Virtual Machines" or "Job Schedule Collections".

operation.description: The concise, localized friendly name for the operation; suitable for dropdowns. E.g. "Create or Update Virtual Machine", "Restart Virtual Machine".

description.description: The short, localized friendly description of the operation; suitable for tool tips and detailed views.

origin.description: The intended executor of the operation; as in Resource Based Access Control (RBAC) and audit logs UX. Default value is "user,system"

actionType.description: Enum. Indicates the action type. "Internal" refers to actions that are for internal only APIs.

OperationListResult.description: A list of REST API operations supported by an Azure Resource Provider. It contains an URL link to get the next set of results.

value.description: List of operations supported by the resource provider

nextLink.description: URL to get the next set of operation list results (if there are any).

OperationStatusResult.description: The current status of an async operation.

id.description: Fully qualified ID for the async operation.

resourceId.description: Fully qualified ID of the resource against which the original async operation was started.

percentComplete.description: Percent of the operation that is complete.

startTime.description: The start time of the operation.

endTime.description: The end time of the operation.

error.description: If present, details of the operation error.

name.description: A user defined name of the 3rd Party Artifact that is being procured.

publisher.description: The publisher of the 3rd Party Artifact that is being bought. E.g. NewRelic

product.description: The 3rd Party artifact that is being procured. E.g. NewRelic. Product maps to the OfferID specified for the artifact at the time of Data Market onboarding.

promotionCode.description: A publisher provided promotion code as provisioned in Data Market for the said product/artifact.

version.description: The version of the desired product/artifact.

ProxyResource.title: Proxy Resource
ProxyResource.description: The resource model definition for a Azure Resource Manager proxy resource. It will not have tags and a location

Resource.title: Resource
Resource.description: Common fields that are returned in the response for all Azure Resource Manager resources

id.description: Fully qualified resource ID for the resource. E.g. "/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/{resourceProviderNamespace}/{resourceType}/{resourceName}"

type.description: The type of the resource. E.g. "Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines" or "Microsoft.Storage/storageAccounts"

systemData.description: Azure Resource Manager metadata containing createdBy and modifiedBy information.

ResourceModelWithAllowedPropertySet.description: The resource model definition containing the full set of allowed properties for a resource. Except properties bag, there cannot be a top level property outside of this set.

managedBy.description: The fully qualified resource ID of the resource that manages this resource. Indicates if this resource is managed by another Azure resource. If this is present, complete mode deployment will not delete the resource if it is removed from the template since it is managed by another resource.

kind.description: Metadata used by portal/tooling/etc to render different UX experiences for resources of the same type. E.g. ApiApps are a kind of Microsoft.Web/sites type.  If supported, the resource provider must validate and persist this value.

etag.description: The etag field is *not* required. If it is provided in the response body, it must also be provided as a header per the normal etag convention.  Entity tags are used for comparing two or more entities from the same requested resource. HTTP/1.1 uses entity tags in the etag (section 14.19), If-Match (section 14.24), If-None-Match (section 14.26), and If-Range (section 14.27) header fields.

Sku.description: The resource model definition representing SKU

name.description: The name of the SKU. E.g. P3. It is typically a letter+number code

size.description: The SKU size. When the name field is the combination of tier and some other value, this would be the standalone code.

family.description: If the service has different generations of hardware, for the same SKU, then that can be captured here.

capacity.description: If the SKU supports scale out/in then the capacity integer should be included. If scale out/in is not possible for the resource this may be omitted.

SkuTier.description: This field is required to be implemented by the Resource Provider if the service has more than one tier, but is not required on a PUT.

TrackedResource.title: Tracked Resource
TrackedResource.description: The resource model definition for an Azure Resource Manager tracked top level resource which has 'tags' and a 'location'

location.description: The geo-location where the resource lives

encryptionProperties.description: Configuration of key for data encryption

status.description: Indicates whether or not the encryption is enabled for container registry.

locationData.description: Metadata pertaining to the geographic location of the resource.

name.description: A canonical name for the geographic or physical location.

city.description: The city or locality where the resource is located.

district.description: The district, state, or province where the resource is located.

countryOrRegion.description: The country or region where the resource is located

systemData.description: Metadata pertaining to creation and last modification of the resource.

createdBy.description: The identity that created the resource.

createdByType.description: The type of identity that created the resource.

lastModifiedBy.description: The identity that last modified the resource.

lastModifiedByType.description: The type of identity that last modified the resource.

lastModifiedAt.description: The timestamp of resource last modification (UTC)
